dao

Class Libro

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.Connector
      • dao.Libro

  • public class Libro
extends Connector
    This class manages books in the DB.

      • insert

        public static void insert(Libro l)
        Adds a book to the database.
        Parameters:
        l - Book to be added.

      • delete

        public static void delete(Libro l)
        Deletes a book from the database.
        Parameters:
        l - Book to be deleted.

      • select

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Libro> select()
        Retrieves every book from the DB. It also retrieves every author, languaje and category of every book.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of books.

      • retrieveIsbn

        public static void retrieveIsbn(Libro l)
        Gets the ISBN of a book by searching by it's variables. If this method fails, it will simply return the same book without ISBN.

      • selectByIsbn

        public static Libro selectByIsbn(int isbn)
        Returns a book with a specific ISBN.
